title: A new way to earn
summary: Start earning up to {{percent}}% annually on your cUSD and cEUR balances. Rates may change so cash in on this sweet promotion!

earnWeekly.text: Send and spend as usual, you’ll earn on the remaining balance.

noMinCommitment.earningText: Earning is stress free: Add cUSD or cEUR to your account and start earning on your balances.
noMinCommitment.connectText: Earning is stress free: Connect your phone number to start earning.

saveMoreEarnMore.text: Deposit up to {{rewardsMax}} cUSD or {{rewardsMax}} cEUR and earn {{percent}}% anually.

conclusion: It’s that simple. Start earning today.
